data.Sentence_cn: 皮卡迪利大街附近的一条著名拱廊街道上，几家高档商店刚刚开始营业。
data.Sentence: The expensive shops in a famous arcade near Piccadilly were just opening.

data.Sentence_cn: 在早晨的这个时候，拱廊街上几乎空无一人。
data.Sentence: At this time of the morning, the arcade was almost empty.

data.Sentence_cn: 珠宝店主泰勒先生正在欣赏新布置的橱窗。
data.Sentence: Mr. Taylor, the owner of a jewellery shop was admiring a new window display.

data.Sentence_cn: 他手下两名店员从早上8点就开始忙碌，这时刚刚布置完毕。
data.Sentence: Two of his assistants had been working busily since eight o'clock and had only just finished.

data.Sentence_cn: 钻石项链、戒指漂亮地陈列在黑色丝绒上面。
data.Sentence: Diamond necklaces and rings had been beautifully arranged on a background of black velvet.

data.Sentence_cn: 泰勒先生站在橱窗外凝神欣赏了几分钟就回到了店里。
data.Sentence: After gazing at the display for several minutes, Mr. Taylor went back into his shop.

data.Sentence_cn: 宁静突然被打破，一辆大轿车亮着前灯，响着喇叭，呼啸着冲进了拱廊街，
data.Sentence: The silence was suddenly broken when a large car, with its headlights on and its horn blaring, roared down the arcade.

data.Sentence_cn: 在珠宝店门口停了下来。
data.Sentence: It came to a stop outside the jeweller's.

data.Sentence_cn: 一人留在驾驶座上，另外两个用黑色长筒丝袜蒙面的人跳下车来。他们用铁棒把商店橱窗的玻璃砸碎。
data.Sentence: One man stayed at the wheel while two others with black stockings over their faces jumped out and smashed the window of the shop with iron bars.

data.Sentence_cn: 这一切发生时，泰勒先生正在楼上。
data.Sentence: While this was going on, Mr. Taylor was upstairs.

data.Sentence_cn: 他与店员动手向窗外投掷家具，椅子，桌子飞落到拱廊街上。
data.Sentence: He and his staff began throwing furniture out of the window. Chairs and tables went flying into the arcade.

data.Sentence_cn: 一个窃贼被一尊很重的雕像击中，但由于他忙着抢钻石首饰，竟连疼痛都顾不上了。
data.Sentence: One of the thieves was struck by a heavy statue, but he was too busy helping himself to diamonds to notice any pain.

data.Sentence_cn: 这场抢劫只持续了3分钟，因为窃贼争先恐后地爬上轿车，以惊人的速度开跑了。
data.Sentence: The raid was all over in three minutes, for the men scrambled back into the car and it moved off at a fantastic speed.

data.Sentence_cn: 就在轿车离开的时候，泰勒先生从店里冲了出来，跟在车后追赶，一边还往车上扔烟灰缸、花瓶。但他已无法抓住那些窃贼了。
data.Sentence: Just as it was leaving, Mr. Taylor rushed out and ran after it throwing ashtrays and vases, but it was impossible to stop the thieves.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们已带着价值数千镑的首饰逃之夭夭了。
data.Sentence: They had got away with thousands of pounds worth of diamonds.
